00014 #ifndef FIXEDSIZESTRING_H
00015 #define FIXEDSIZESTRING_H
00016 
00017 #include "ScopedArray.h"
00018 
00019 #include "MC2String.h"
00020 #include "StackOrHeap.h"
00021 
00022 #include <stdarg.h>
00023 #include <string.h>
00024 #include <iostream>
00025 
00034 class FixedSizeString {
00035 public:
00036    typedef char value_type;
00037    typedef size_t size_type;
00038    typedef char* iterator;
00039    typedef const char* const_iterator;
00040 
00042    explicit FixedSizeString( const FixedSizeString& str ):
00043       m_array( str.getMaxSize() ),
00044       m_maxSize( str.getMaxSize() ) {
00045       copy( str );
00046    }
00047 
00049    explicit FixedSizeString( size_t size ):
00050       m_array( size ),
00051       m_maxSize( size ) {
00052       memset( m_array, 0, size );
00053    }
00054 
00055    FixedSizeString& operator = ( const char* src ) {
00056       copy( src );
00057       return *this;
00058    }
00059 
00060    FixedSizeString& operator = ( const FixedSizeString& str ) {
00061       copy( str );
00062       return *this;
00063    }
00064 
00065    // copies other string, but maximum getMaxSize() items 
00066    void copy( const char* src ) {
00067       strncpy( begin(), src, getMaxSize() );
00068       begin()[ getMaxSize() - 1 ] = 0;
00069    }
00070 
00072    void copy( const FixedSizeString& str ) {
00073       copy( str.begin() );
00074    }
00075 
00077    iterator begin() { 
00078       return const_cast<iterator>
00079          ( const_cast<const FixedSizeString*>
00080            (this)->begin() ); 
00081    }
00083    iterator end() { return const_cast<iterator>
00084                        ( const_cast<const FixedSizeString*>(this)->end() ); }
00085 
00087    const_iterator begin() const { 
00088       return m_array; 
00089    }
00090 
00092    const_iterator end() const { return begin() + size(); }
00093 
00095    char& operator[] ( size_type index ) { 
00096       return const_cast<char&>
00097          ( const_cast<const FixedSizeString&>(*this)[ index ] );
00098    }
00099 
00101    const char& operator [] ( size_type index ) const {
00102       return begin()[ index ];
00103    }
00104 
00106    const char* c_str() const { return begin(); }
00107 
00109    size_type size() const { return strlen( begin() ); }
00110 
00112    bool empty() const { return begin()[0] == 0; }
00113 
00115    size_type getMaxSize() const { return m_maxSize; }
00116                 
00117 private:
00118    StackOrHeap<256, char> m_array;
00119    const size_t m_maxSize;
00120 };
00121 
00126 int sprintf( FixedSizeString& str, const char* formatStr, ... )
00127    __attribute__ ((format (printf, 2, 3)));
00128 
00129 inline int sprintf( FixedSizeString& str, const char* formatStr, ... )
00130 {
00131    va_list args;
00132    va_start( args, formatStr );
00133 
00134    int nbrPrinted = vsnprintf( str.begin(), str.getMaxSize(),
00135                                formatStr, args );
00136 
00137    // we set end null.
00138    // nbrPrinted could be -1 for old glibc.
00139    // See manual for snprintf.
00140    str[ str.getMaxSize() - 1 ] = 0;
00141 
00142    va_end( args );
00143    return nbrPrinted;
00144 }
00145 
00147 inline ostream& operator << ( ostream& ostr, const FixedSizeString& str ) {
00148    ostr << str.c_str();
00149    return ostr;
00150 }
00151 
00153 inline MC2String& operator += ( MC2String& dest, const FixedSizeString& src ) {
00154    dest += src.c_str();
00155    return dest;
00156 }
00157 
00159 inline MC2String operator + ( const MC2String& strA, const FixedSizeString& strB ) {
00160    return strA + strB.c_str();
00161 }
00162 
00164 inline bool operator == ( const FixedSizeString& strA, const char* str ) {
00165   return strncmp( strA.c_str(), str, strA.getMaxSize() ) == 0;
00166 }
00167 
00169 inline bool operator == ( const FixedSizeString& first, 
00170                           const FixedSizeString& second ) {
00171    return 
00172       strncmp( first.c_str(), second.c_str(), 
00173                min( first.getMaxSize(),
00174                     second.getMaxSize() ) ) == 0;
00175 }
